A magical world where zebras are not only black and white but also come in various colors such as red, green, blue, yellow, orange, and purple. Each color represents a different personality trait or characteristic of the zebra, making them unique individuals.
A story about a zebra who discovers that he has the power to change his colors at will, and uses this ability to help others in need.
A children's book series featuring a rainbow-colored zebra who goes on adventures with her friends, encountering new colors and learning important life lessons along the way.
An interactive game where players can choose which color their zebra will be and then navigate through a colorful obstacle course, collecting coins and avoiding obstacles.
A fashion line inspired by the rainbow-colored zebra, featuring clothing items in bright, bold colors that reflect the zebra's personality traits.
